author: Staff Reporter
text:
Ahead of Pongal, Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan inaugurated distribution of free saris, dhotis at the offices of Village Administrative Officers in Vadaseri near Krishnankoil in Nagercoil and Kottaram near Kanyakumari on Friday.

While 4,28,113 beneficiaries would be given free dhoties and 4,26,701 women would get free saris.

Through VAO offices

The saris and dhotis would be distributed through the 188 VAO offices in the four taluks.

Kanyakumari MLA K.T. Pachaimal, District Revenue Officer A. Udhayakumar, Nagercoil Revenue Divisional Officer S. Mazhiyazhagan, Tamil Nadu Minorities Commission Member A. Justin Selvaraj, Special Deputy Collector (Social Security Schemes) Subbiah participated. The scheme was inaugurated by Chief Minister Jayalalithaa at the Secretariat a few days ago.
title: Distribution of free saris, dhotis inaugurated
